c74object.name: el.buffet~
c74object.digest: Perform operations on the contents of an MSP buffer.
c74object.description:
el.buffet~
provides a variety of irreversible transformations to the contents of a buffer, along with some useful analysis of its contents.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: Bang on completion of buffer operation

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: average RMS of selected buffer region

method.name: catbuf
method.description: concatenate the contents of a separate buffer to the current buffer. Both buffers must have the same number of channels. The current buffer will be resized to accommodate the new samples appended to the end.

method.name: copy_to_buffer
method.description: Copy a region of the current buffer to a second buffer. The destination buffer is erased prior to copying. Both buffers must have the same number of channels. Start and end times are specified in milliseconds.

method.name: copy_to_mono_buffer

arg.name: buffer name, channel, start, end, [fadein, fadeout]

method.description: Copy a single channel of a region of the current buffer to a second, mono buffer. Useful for de-multiplexing buffers. The destination buffer is erased prior to copying. Start and end times are specified in milliseconds. Channels are counted starting at zero. If fadein and fadeout times (ms) are provided, the excerpt will be enveloped in the new buffer.

method.name: dc_coef
method.description: Set the dc filter coefficient. By default it is 0.995.

method.name: erase
method.description: Clear all channels of a specified region of the file.

method.name: events
method.description: RMS based attempt to identify events within buffer. Output is a list sent from outlet two.

method.name: fadein
method.description: Apply a fade in. Fade time is in ms.

method.name: fadeout
method.description: Apply a fade out. Fade time is in ms.

method.name: fixdenorm
method.description: Replace any denormaled samples with zeros.

method.name: info
method.description: Print current parameters.

method.name: internal_fadeout
method.description: Fades out over a specified region.

method.name: killdc
method.description: Remove DC signal from buffer contents.

method.name: maxswap
method.description: Set maximum swap time.

method.name: minswap
method.description: Set minimum swap time.

method.name: nakedswap
method.description: Swap two blocks, with no enveloping.

method.name: normalize
method.description: Normalize entire buffer to target peak amplitude.

method.name: normalize_selection
method.description: Normalize specified region to target peak amplitude.

method.name: overdub

arg.name: dubsource, skipin, skipout, gain, segdur, fadein, fadeout

method.description: Overdub a segment from a second buffer into a specified region in the current buffer.

method.name: overlap
method.description: Set overlap time for swapped segments. Default is 20 milliseconds.

method.name: pevents
method.description: Segment buffer into percussive events. The bufsize is the chunk for RMS averaging. 50 ms is recommended to start. The diff threshold is the threshold for changes in amplitude. Try 0.01 to start. Events are sent as a list of data from the second outlet.

method.name: resize
method.description: Resize the current buffer.

method.name: retroblock
method.description: Reverse a randomly selected segment.

method.name: reverse
method.description: Reverse entire buffer.

method.name: rmschunk
method.description: Reports the RMS average of a specified region. The value is sent to the third outlet.

method.name: rotatetozero
method.description: Rotates buffer contents to start at the specified start point.

method.name: setbuf
method.description: Select current buffer.

method.name: spritz
method.description: Fills buffer with random spikes (-1 to 1). Density is the average number of spikes per second.

method.name: specswap
method.description: Swap blocks in buffer according to specifications.

method.name: swap
method.description: Randomly swap two blocks in buffer.

method.name: trimzero
method.description: Removing leading and trailing zeros in buffer. Buffer is resized. Optionally specify threshold to remove low noise too. Default value is 0.000001.
